meanings.sent1: The sow farrowed in the barn yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The farmer's sow will farrow soon.
meanings.sent3: The piglets cheered as their mother farrowed.
meanings.sent4: The field farrowed new life with each piglet's arrival.
meanings.sent5: The sound of piglets squealing filled the air as the sow farrowed.

meanings.definition: The act of a sow giving birth to piglets.
meanings.sent1: The farrowed brought joy to the farm.
meanings.sent2: The farmer witnessed the farrowed with excitement.
meanings.sent3: The farrowed event was a highlight of the day.
meanings.sent4: The farrowed was a beautiful sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The farrowed marked the beginning of new life on the farm.
